GSD.attack_vector: social engineering to save an image file
GSD.description: In Apple Mac OS version 12.6 a reported information disclosure exists in the background photo processing (e.g. searching for known faces, indexing files by time and location taken) that can be attacked via social engineering, e.g. if an image with a QR code is saved and then processed Mac OS will reportedly process the QR code data, and if it is a URL it will load the URL disclosing information about the system (user agent, IP address, etc.).

OSV.summary: information disclosure in Mac OS version 12.6
OSV.details: In Apple Mac OS version 12.6 a reported information disclosure exists in the background photo processing (e.g. searching for known faces, indexing files by time and location taken) that can be attacked via social engineering, e.g. if an image with a QR code is saved and then processed Mac OS will reportedly process the QR code data, and if it is a URL it will load the URL disclosing information about the system (user agent, IP address, etc.).
